Entries.Description: Improved the legibility of the Template tab in the CloudFormation stack viewer
Fixed issue where yaml based CloudFormation templates could not be deployed when they contained short form notation
Fixed issue where CloudFormation Stacks could not be viewed from AWS Explorer when they contained yaml short form notation

IAM Roles created when deploying to Beanstalk will now reference the managed policy AWSElasticBeanstalkManagedUpdatesCustomerRolePolicy instead of AWSElasticBeanstalkService, which is deprecated. Users are encouraged to update any roles having the deprecated managed policy AWSElasticBeanstalkService. For more information, please see - https://docs.aws.amazon.com/elasticbeanstalk/latest/dg/security-iam-awsmanpol.html
Source account is now included in the resource policy when creating event notifications for S3 buckets.
Removed optional account number field from credential profile dialogs.
